author.location: Sunny Gosport on the South Coast

posts.content:
I was coming home from work at midday and followed a very nice 11 window on the west bound A27 and M27 for a while. I had my dark visor on so it looked like a greenish turqoiuse'y ( sorry if the colour is wrong ).

The sun was shinining , they were just cruising at about 60/65, stock height ( I think ) , just looked soo good

If it was yours X**995A (perhaps ? ), very cool looking bus. I was jealous

Andy
